TopicTitle: how do i turn The Space Planes

Articles.Content:
How Do i turn the space planes i copyed a design i saw in a video i can take off just fine but i cant figure out how to turn in the video the plane makes nice quick turns but for me it takes long drawn out turns then spins out of control.

Any Advice?

The roll control keys are Q and E, not A and D as you'd expect. So first try pressing Right Caps Lock to make your keyboard input smaller, then use Q or E to bank to left or right, then use the S key to pull the nose up and into the turn. When you're flying the direction you wish to go, use the other Roll key to level out again.

Do you have SAS turned on? If so, it resists turning. That makes the plane more stable, but less manueverable. You can either turn it off again, or temporarily deactivate it with the F key just long enough to make your sharp turn.
